modName: Warpaint Makeup for Human Females Vanilla Replacer
summary:
I just want more complex warpaints styles for my character.

This Mod replaces the warpaint of the vanilla game with 10 new ones develop for my Female Nord race, but apply for all feminine human races.

Only replaces the warpaint of the main character, not NPC
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=yellow]Warpaint For Human Females (Replacer Vanilla)[/color]

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/33327-1-1363393366.jpg[/img]

I just want more complex warpaints styles for my character.

This Mod replaces the warpaint of the vanilla game with 10 new ones develop for my Female Nord race, but apply for all feminine human races.

Alll warpaint are bone-style, perfect for dark skins, i recomend to use white colors for the bone-effect.

Next Time_

My 1rst Mod :D

[color=red]NOTE: V 2.0 READY! Add 2 new warpaint replacers and fix bad definition :D

Only replaces the warpaint of the main character, not NPC[/color][/center]
author: The Ex Maverik
